title: For the glory of shurima! (I baked a silly cake)
body:
Here are the process images, I forgot to take one while it was juts a cake with chocolate.
Its *Suppose* to be a sun disk. (IM NOT GOOD AT BAKING CAKES OR COOKING IN GENERAL)

First process, Made a green "T" looking thing as in the sun disk, it seems to have a green underlay.
http://imgur.com/5rtgP5P

Second was the water, which flows around the first yellow circle and goes down along the green.
http://imgur.com/KBTk1Nf

Finally, added yellow for the Sun disk itself, and the yellow/Gold outlining.
http://imgur.com/h4HJy0O

The sundisk as reference.
http://static.tumblr.com/2da7986a73e92f2664b92757fe90fbff/wvgitry/Jmondg9px/tumblr_static_4jwwe6f2s46cwcs8w8okow4wo.png

I'm not good at cooking, but it was fun to make a league themed cake.
(I might hire a professional next time. as I have nearly destroyed the cake multiple times)

replies.body: It looks more like a ward.{{item:2302}}

> [{quoted}](name=Yasei Doubutsu,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=zmVcLjbG,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-11-03T06:07:06.288+0000)
>
> lol

Man your cake looks so rushed. I laughed then chuckled for like 8 seconds lol. No offense meant! I've never even tried to bake a cake. You could have used wafers as paneling and slide them into the cake at angles to copy the metal, homemade gummy or buy candy strips that are light blue for the running water (use scissors/knives to design it into water-like strips), mold...I'll shut up now. You make me want to try bake a cake out of interest and lurve for the game lol. Take more time next time???

> [{quoted}](name=oPuredo,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=zmVcLjbG,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-03T05:59:35.358+0000)
>
> It looks more like a ward.{{item:2302}}

Honestly, I would have tried to make a ward first if I had to. xD I'm so scrub at cooking but sneaky.
Huh. I wonder why the those links wont show.

The middle makes me think about cookies :l https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/236x/bb/33/c6/bb33c66f1fedaa0b67eba4a99048891f.jpg https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/originals/56/e3/9f/56e39f82c0e96a6a6ef7889e9337e980.jpg https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/236x/f8/e5/6c/f8e56ce0e7d6e5416ccf367020fe1dd7.jpg http://cdn.quotesgram.com/small/39/16/1211697036-funny-dump-miltonious-blog-02.jpg http://ifunnyweb.com/wp-content/uploads/funny-Cookie-monster-closet.jpg
